thread.title: Walkers could be ditching one of these favourite crisp flavours - and it's up to the public to decide - Leicester Mercury

author: Hayley Watson
title: Walkers could be ditching one of these favourite crisp flavours - and it's up to the public to decide - Leicester Mercury
text:
Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Comments 
Bad news for hardcore Walkers fans - you might have to say goodbye to one of your favourite flavours soon. 
The Leicester-based crisp company is pitting six flavours against each other, with the decision on who stays and who goes down to a public vote. 
Dubbed "Choose Me or Lose Me", the Brexit-tinged campaign will put some classic British flavours head to head with some new internationally-inspired flavours. Read More See the city and county restaurants that have been shortlisted at the English Curry Awards 2017 Walkers have unveiled the Choose Me or Lose Me campaign (Image: Walkers) 
And they're not messing around, as the crisp giant has put some of its most beloved packets up for elimination. 
Yep, in the firing line are classic flavours including Smoky Bacon, Prawn Cocktail, and even Salt & Vinegar. 
Each flavour will go head to head with a completely new one, and the one with the least number of votes will go - and it could be tough, as some of the newbies sound pretty good. Read More 
Smoky Bacon will be up against the cheesy Bacon & Cheddar, representing the USA. 
And Salt & Vinegar will be going head to head with the tangy-sounding Lime & Black Pepper from Australia. 
Meanwhile Prawn Cocktail will be pitted against Spain's smoky Paprika. Walkers could be ditching one of these favourite crisp flavours (Image: Walkers) 
The limited edition new flavours will be sold in single packs only, with each purchase counting as a vote. 
You can also head to Walkers' Facebook or Twitter and vote for your choice with the hashtag #ChooseorLose. Read More 
The decision will be made with an 80/20 split between sales and website voting. 
So go on - vote for your favourite flavour, or you might lose them forever! Read More
